meanings.sent1: The school underwent reaccreditation to ensure its quality standards.
meanings.sent2: The hospital's reaccreditation was a lengthy process but necessary for patient safety.
meanings.sent3: The reaccreditation of the zoo made the animals very happy.
meanings.sent4: The reaccreditation of the restaurant was like a fresh coat of paint, making it shine brighter.
meanings.sent5: The reaccreditation of the museum brought in more visitors, eager to see the improvements.

meanings.sent1: After the reaccreditation, the university proudly displayed its renewed status.
meanings.sent2: The reaccreditation of the company was a team effort involving all employees.
meanings.sent3: The reaccreditation of the gym felt like a victory lap for the staff.
meanings.sent4: The reaccreditation of the library was a beacon of success in the community.
meanings.sent5: The reaccreditation of the clinic brought a sense of relief to the patients.
